item.title: 燃料批发商Arko Petroleum在美国IPO中筹集2亿美元
item.description: 便利店企业Arko Corp.旗下的燃料批发子公司Arko Petroleum Corp.通过扩大规模的首次公开募股筹集了2亿美元，发行价处于市场预估区间的下限。【原文：Arko Petroleum Corp., the fuel wholesaler subsidiary of convenience store firm Arko Corp., raised $200 million in an upsized initial public offering that priced at the bottom of a marketed range.】

item.title: 安联集团股价创2003年以来最大跌幅，全年业绩未达预期
item.description: 总部位于悉尼的AMP有限公司（业务涵盖财富管理与退休储蓄）因全年利润未达预期，股价创下逾二十年来最大跌幅。【原文：AMP Ltd., the Sydney-based firm that spans wealth management and retirement savings, sank the most in more than two decades after full-year profits missed expectations.】

item.title: Founders Fund、D.E. Shaw、Dragoneer领投Anthropic融资
item.description: 知情人士透露，Anthropic正接近完成一笔融资交易，此轮融资规模超过200亿美元，由包括彼得·蒂尔的创始人基金、德华投资公司和Dragoneer投资集团在内的投资者联合领投。这笔融资使这家人工智能公司获得的投资方阵容进一步扩大，也成为有史以来规模最大的初创企业融资之一。【原文：Anthropic is nearing the completion of a deal to raise more than $20 billion in a funding round co-led by investors including Peter Thiel’s Founders Fund, D.E. Shaw & Co. and Dragoneer Investment Group, according to people familiar with the matter — adding to the artificial intelligence company’s roster of backers in one of the largest startup funding rounds ever.】

item.title: 清街公司首次公开募股据称因估值问题遭遇投资者抵制
item.description: 据知情人士透露，在周四预期定价前，Clear Street Group Inc.的首次公开募股因目标估值问题正面临投资者抵制。【原文：Clear Street Group Inc.’s initial public offering is facing investor pushback on its targeted valuation ahead of the expected pricing Thursday, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 资生堂财报超预期，股价创近8年来最大涨幅
item.description: 资生堂公司股价创近八年最大涨幅，此前该公司公布的第四季度财报及全年业绩预期均超出分析师预期。【原文：Shiseido Co. rose the most in nearly eight years after the company’s fourth quarter earnings and full-year forecast beat analyst estimates.】

item.title: 印度CPI改革或为央行按兵不动提供理由
item.description: 印度将于周四公布基于新指数的通胀数据，分析师称该数据可能显示经济中存在较高的价格压力，这将使央行有理由维持利率不变。【原文：India will publish inflation figures based on a new index on Thursday, which analysts say may show elevated price pressures in the economy, giving the central bank reason to keep interest rates on hold.】

item.title: 日本投资者仍担忧高市早苗将引发新一轮崩盘
item.description: 日本首相高市早苗以压倒性优势赢得选举后，投资者初期反应普遍积极。但他们仍对她扩张性支出计划可能引发的另一轮市场崩盘保持警惕。【原文：Japanese Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi’s landslide election win saw a largely positive initial response from investors. But they remain wary of another market meltdown over her expansive spending plans.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行行长称若通胀持续顽固将考虑再度加息
item.description: 澳大利亚央行行长米歇尔·布洛克表示，若通胀持续居高不下，央行已做好进一步加息的准备。她同时强调，央行董事会仍持谨慎态度，尚未决定是否需要进一步收紧货币政策。【原文：Australia’s central bank stands ready to raise interest rates further if inflation proves persistent, Governor Michele Bullock said, stressing that the board remains cautious and is yet to decide whether further tightening is warranted.】

item.title: 蓝猫楔形堆栈以21亿美元贷款助推人工智能债务热潮
item.description: 据知情人士透露，蓝猫资本旗下的数据中心公司Stack Infrastructure Inc.正寻求约30亿澳元（合21亿美元）的贷款，以加速在澳大利亚的开发进程，满足人工智能和云服务激增的需求。【原文：Blue Owl Capital-owned data center company Stack Infrastructure Inc. is seeking a loan of around A$3 billion ($2.1 billion), according to people familiar with the matter, as it accelerates development in Australia to meet surging demand for artificial intelligence and cloud services.】

item.title: 伦敦房价跌势将触底，皇家特许测量师学会调查显示
item.description: 一项周四公布的调查显示，房地产经纪人首次预测伦敦房价将上涨，这是逾一年来首次出现此类预期。【原文：For the first time in more than a year, property agents expect house prices to rise in London, a survey revealed Thursday.】

item.title: 橡树资本在特殊情况基金首次关闭时创纪录地筹集了24亿美元
item.description: 据知情人士透露，橡树资本管理公司已为其最新设立的专注于企业特殊状况的基金获得24亿美元的认购承诺，创下该策略的最高纪录。【原文：Oaktree Capital Management LP has secured $2.4 billion in commitments for its latest fund focused on corporate special situations, according to people familiar with the matter, setting a firm record for that strategy.】

item.title: 资金涌入押注港股通，此前该通道已实现27%回报率
item.description: 每年此时，香港市场都会出现一种热门策略：押注哪些股票将被纳入交易互联机制，使内地投资者能便捷地购买香港股票。【原文：A popular strategy pops up in Hong Kong around this time each year: betting on which stocks will be added to a trading link giving mainland buyers easy access to the city’s shares.】

item.title: 油价上涨，交易员评估伊朗紧张局势与库存水平
item.description: 油价连续第二日上涨，交易员们将目光聚焦于美伊紧张局势，该局势已盖过供应量增长的迹象。【原文：Oil rose for a second day as traders focused on tensions between the US and Iran that have overshadowed signs of swelling supplies.】

item.title: 黄金价格回落，因强劲的美国就业报告削弱降息预期
item.description: 在强劲的美国就业数据降低市场对美联储将迅速降息的预期后，金价出现下跌。【原文：Gold slipped after robust US jobs data reduced expectations the Federal Reserve will move quickly to cut interest rates.】

item.title: 美国众议院无视特朗普，投票决定终止其对加拿大加征关税
item.description: 由共和党主导的美国众议院通过了一项旨在终止特朗普总统对加拿大加征关税的法案，这表明在中期选举前夕，白宫以可负担性为核心的经济议程正引发日益加剧的焦虑。【原文：The Republican-led US House passed legislation aimed at ending President Donald Trump’s tariffs on Canada, signaling a growing anxiety over the White House’s economic agenda before midterm elections focused heavily on affordability.】

item.title: 澳交所宣布降低股息派发以应对监管调查成本
item.description: ASX有限公司下调了上半年股息，并预测未来几年派息将减少，因其正应对监管调查相关的成本，同时开始物色新任首席执行官。【原文：ASX Ltd. lowered its first-half dividend and forecast reduced payouts for the next few years as it grapples with costs tied to a regulatory probe, and starts its hunt for a new chief executive.】

item.title: 埃利奥特55亿美元日本投资计划面临丰田最后期限考验
item.description: 埃利奥特投资管理公司以激进投资风格押注日本市场，投入资金达数十亿美元。如今，随着关键期限终于到来，该公司正面临一场备受瞩目的考验。【原文：Elliott Investment Management has bet billions applying its tough style of activist investing to Japan. Now, as a crucial deadline finally arrives, the firm faces a high-profile test.】

item.title: 空客斩获加拿大航空A350宽体客机大额订单
item.description: 加拿大航空将购入八架空客A350-1000型飞机，并保留将订单数量翻倍的选项，以实现机队现代化升级。【原文：Air Canada will acquire eight Airbus SE A350-1000 models, with options to double the order, as the carrier seeks to modernize its fleet.】

item.title: 美国就业数据激增后国债下跌，股市震荡：市场综述
item.description: 美国就业数据意外激增冲击美国国债，交易员削减了对美联储今年降息的押注。美国股市收盘持平后，亚洲股指期货涨跌不一。【原文：A surprise surge in US jobs hit Treasuries as traders pared bets on Federal Reserve rate cuts this year. Asian equity futures were mixed after US stocks ended flat.】

item.title: Waymo联合首席执行官规划2026年实现每周百万次出行目标
item.description: 据联合首席执行官特克德拉·马瓦卡纳透露，谷歌母公司Alphabet旗下的自动驾驶部门Waymo，今年年底前在美国每周收费自动驾驶出租车出行量将突破100万次。【原文：Waymo, Alphabet Inc.’s autonomous driving unit, will hit more than 1 million paid weekly robotaxi rides in the US by the end of this year, according to co-Chief Executive Officer Tekedra Mawakana.】

item.title: 美联储的米兰表示仍有诸多理由降息
item.description: 美联储理事斯蒂芬·米兰表示，1月份就业数据的意外强劲表现并不意味着政策制定者应推迟进一步降息。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Stephen Miran said surprising strength in January’s jobs data doesn’t mean policymakers should hold off additional interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 巴西企业家马尔西亚诺·泰斯塔在农业银行上市后跻身亿万富豪行列
item.description: 巴西金融科技公司Agi Inc.创始人马尔西亚诺·泰斯塔周三成为亿万富翁，尽管该公司首次公开募股过程波折不断。【原文：Brazilian fintech founder Marciano Testa became a billionaire Wednesday despite a rocky initial public offering by his company, Agi Inc.】

item.title: 思科发布强劲销售预测，人工智能渗透再现新迹象
item.description: 思科系统公司作为全球最大的计算机网络和互联网设备制造商，对当前季度给出了乐观预测，这表明该公司正吸引着人工智能系统建设客户的青睐。【原文：Cisco Systems Inc., the largest maker of machines that run computer networks and the internet, delivered an upbeat forecast for the current quarter, signaling that the company is attracting customers building artificial intelligence systems.】

item.title: Couche-Tard股价上涨，因新展望中搁置并购计划
item.description: 阿尔利门塔西塔德公司表示，将更加专注于有机增长和提升商品销售额，因其最新财务展望中未提及并购计划，该零售商股价因此升至2024年以来的最高水平。【原文：Alimentation Couche-Tard Inc. said it will focus more on organic growth and boosting its merchandise revenues as mergers and acquisitions were kept out of its latest financial outlook, sending the retailer’s stock price to its highest level since 2024.】

item.title: 人工智能竞赛催生顶级超大规模企业支持的数据中心债务
item.description: 某数据中心业主首次获得三大评级机构之一的最高信用评级，该业主向人工智能矩阵的运营商提供租赁服务。【原文：A data-center landlord leasing to the operators of the artificial intelligence matrix secured the highest credit grade from one of the top three ratings firms for the first time.】

item.title: 麦当劳业绩超预期，价值战略成效显著
item.description: 麦当劳公司第四季度美国销售额增速创逾两年新高，其超值套餐持续受到注重成本的食客青睐。【原文：McDonald’s Corp.’s US sales grew at the fastest pace in more than two years in the fourth quarter as value meals continued to resonate with cost-conscious diners.】

item.title: 韩国人正回避特朗普艳羡的危险造船工作
item.description:
对低薪移民劳动力的依赖凸显了该模式背后的风险。

【原文：

The reliance on low-paid migrant labor underscores the risks behind the model.

】

item.title: 房地产服务类股成为"人工智能恐慌交易"最新多米诺骨牌
item.description: 房地产服务类股周三下跌，投资者正评估这些公司面临新一轮人工智能应用和工具冲击的脆弱性，这些技术正威胁着颠覆多个行业。【原文：Real estate services stocks sank Wednesday as investors assessed the companies’ vulnerability to the newest crop of artificial intelligence applications and tools that threatens to disrupt several industries.】

item.title: 埃隆·马斯克在联合创始人离职后重组xAI部门架构
item.description: 埃隆·马斯克表示，在两位联合创始人本周早些时候离职后，他重组了自己的人工智能初创公司xAI。【原文：Elon Musk said he reorganized xAI, his artificial intelligence startup, following the exit of two of its co-founders earlier this week.】

item.title: 2026财年前三个月美国预算缺口缩减17%
item.description: 关税收入在财政年度前四个月帮助缩减了17%的美国预算赤字，这凸显了特朗普政府面临的关键问题之一——最高法院正在审议总统是否有权征收大部分关税。【原文：Tariff revenue helped shrink the US budget deficit by 17% in the first four months of the fiscal year, showcasing one of the stakes for the administration as the Supreme Court weighs whether President Donald Trump had the authority to impose most of his duties.】
